message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your business operations. Let's start by discussing a fair price. My initial offer for the product is $1500000.

Thank you for offering your premium product, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, my budget allows me to spend up to $1000000. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.
Thank you for your interest in our premium product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. My counteroffer for the product is $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $980000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $1020000.
I understand your position, Alice. Given the current market conditions and my financial situation, I would like to propose a final offer of $990000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to sell it to you for $1005000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final offer of $995000 for the product.
I understand your offer, Bob. After further review, I am willing to sell the product to you for $1000000.
